channel.title: OK.. some fag keeps iming me.. how do i find out who it is by their screen name?
channel.description:
OK.. some fag keeps iming me.. how do i find out who it is by their screen name?
and some other stuff like their IP

item.title: OK.. some fag keeps iming me.. how do i find out who it is by their screen name?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:5, topic:5758”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=7669.msg80730#msg80730 date=1153550061]

OK… some fag keeps iming me… how do i find out who it is by their screen name?

and some other stuff like their IP

Yes, iming you. With what? MSN? Yahoo? AIM?

http://img92.imageshack.us/img92/2255/serr5gs75s76e76gg55gqk0.png For MSN.
[/quote]

Nice Picture, talking to p00flake, eh?

Why don’t you just block them? Isn’t that possible?[/quote]

He’s cool and most people are busy/away/porn or somthing.

Read full topic
item.source: OK.. some fag keeps iming me.. how do i find out who it is by their screen name?

item.title: OK.. some fag keeps iming me.. how do i find out who it is by their screen name?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

Get their trust, talk to 'em for awhile, and then get them to get a file from you. Open up an MS-DOS prompt and get their ip. Then scare the hell out of them by saying "I know your IP and that was a virus Bye-bye. That’s what I would do if he was really pissing the hell out of me and asing me for it.

Read full topic
